audit.strategy_description: Best-over/best-under no-vig baseline with deterministic minutes/usage and context gates.

key_injuries.note: Out For Season (Knee) - The Thunder announced on Friday (Sept. 5) that Sorber will miss the 2025-2026 season with a torn ACL.
Out For Season (ACL) - The Rockets said on Monday (Sept. 22) that VanVleet suffered a torn ACL and may be out for the entire 2025-26 campaign, per Shams Charania of ESPN.
Out For Season (Achilles) - The Trail Blazers said on Thursday (Sept. 25) that Lillard won't be back on the court for the 2025-26 season due to his achilles injury.
Out For Season (Shoulder) - Kessler will undergo left shoulder surgery to address a torn labrum and will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season, as per Tony Jones of The Athletic.
Out For Season (Hip) - Beal will undergo season-ending surgery on his left hip, as per ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
Out For Season (Shoulder) - The Bulls reported on Wednesday (Dec. 3) that Essengue will have shoulder surgery and miss the remainder of the season, per HC Billy Donovan.
Out For Season (Foot) - The Mavericks announced on Sunday (Dec. 21) that Lively II has successfully underwent foot surgery.
Out For Season (Shoulder) - Whitmore has begun the recovery process for a diagnosed venous condition, and he will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season.
Out For Season (Knee) - Butler's injury from Monday (Jan. 19) Night's game involves a torn right ACL and he will be out for the rest of the season, as per Shams Charania of ESPN.

Out For Season (Achilles) - The Pacers said on Tuesday (Jan. 27) that Haliburton will likely be in line for a relatively normal offseason and should be free of restrictions for the start of training camp next fall.
Out For Season (Ankle) - The Rockets said on Wednesday (Jan. 28) that Adams underwent season-ending ankle surgery.

Out For Season (Ankle) - The Spurs announced on Wednesday (Feb. 4) that Jones Garcia underwent ankle surgery and will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season, per Tom Orsborn of the San Antonio Express-News.
Out For Season (Finger) - The Wizards said on Friday (Feb. 6) that Davis is expected to sit out the remainder of the 2025-26 season, per Chris Haynes of NBA TV.
Out For Season (Knee) - Furphy was diagnosed with a torn right ACL on Monday and will miss the remainder of the season, Michael Scotto of USA Today
Out For Season (Knee) - The Jazz said on Thursday (Feb. 12) that Jackson Jr. will miss the rest of the season to undergo knee surgery.
Out (Foot) - The Nuggets announced on Monday (Dec. 22) that Bates will be re-evaluated in 12 weeks.
Out (Thumb) - Castleton remains out with an injury and continues to be evaluated; return status is undetermined.
Out (Foot) - The Pacers announced on Wednesday (Jan. 31) that Toppin doesn't have a timetable for a return yet, per Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star.

Out (Neck) - The Bucks announced on Thursday (Jan. 1) that Prince applied for a Disabled Player Exception for Prince earlier this month, indicating that they anticipate that he's substantially more likely than not to be unable to play through June 15, per
Out (Foot) - Strus is expected to miss at least four more weeks, per Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com.

gaps: Official NBA injury report data was not cleanly parsed (missing links, download failure, or empty parse rows).
Roster feed returned no team/player rows for these events.
Slate spreads/totals were unavailable in this snapshot.
Health gates triggered watchlist-only mode for this snapshot.
Model uses market-implied fair probabilities with injury/roster/opponent adjustments.
Minutes/usage projection uses deterministic core rules, not learned distributions.
SGP/SGPx correlation uses deterministic haircut rules (core model).

health_gates.injuries_context_stale: Injury context cache exceeds configured freshness TTL.
health_gates.odds_snapshot_stale: Latest quote timestamp exceeds configured staleness threshold.
health_gates.official_injury_missing: Official NBA injury source is unavailable or unusable.
health_gates.roster_context_stale: Roster context cache exceeds configured freshness TTL.

strategy_description.s001: Best-over/best-under no-vig baseline with deterministic minutes/usage and context gates.
strategy_description.s002: Same core model as s001, but includes tier-B single-book edges with stricter EV floor.
strategy_description.s003: Uses median per-book no-vig baseline, with fallback to best-sides baseline.
strategy_description.s004: Skips lines unless at least 2 books post both over and under at the same point.
strategy_description.s005: Skips lines when median per-book hold exceeds the configured cap.
strategy_description.s006: Skips lines when per-book no-vig probability IQR exceeds the configured cap.
strategy_description.s007: Composes median no-vig baseline with min-2 book-pair and hold-cap gates (s003 + s004 + s005).

strategy_mode.full_board: No global health gate blocks; ranked eligible board is active.
strategy_mode.watchlist_only: One or more global health gates are active; all candidates are watchlist-only.

strategy_status.modeled_with_gates: Deterministic strategy report generated with reliability gates applied.

strategy.description: Best-over/best-under no-vig baseline with deterministic minutes/usage and context gates.
strategy.name: Baseline Core
strategy.title: Baseline Core

under_sweep.note: No Unders >= threshold; showing closest misses with PLAY-TO numbers.
